---
title: "Community Knowledge Profile"
format: 
  pdf:
    echo: false
    message: false
    warning: false
editor: visual
params: 
  community: ""
---
  
```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)

df <- iris |>  
  filter(Species == params$community)
```

```{r}
#| label: vis

df %>% 
  filter(Species == params$community) |>  
  ggplot(aes(Sepal.Width)) +
    geom_histogram() +
    ggtitle(str_c("Distribution of Sepal.Length for ", params$community))
```
